QuestData.Title: Zul'Drak
QuestData.Description: Our death knight allies in Zul'Drak are in need of heroes to aid them in securing the troll lands from the Scourge.$b$bThose willing to aid should travel to the southwestern camp of Ebon Watch and speak with Stefan Vadu there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Stefan Vadu at Ebon Watch in Zul'Drak.
